SELECT a.user_sign,a.biz_time sign_biz_time,a.biz_user,a.USER_NAME sign_user_name FROM (SELECT u.`user_sign`,p.`biz_time`,p.`biz_user`,u.`USER_NAME` FROM qkjm_r_apply a LEFT JOIN qkjm_h_process p ON (a.`uuid`=p.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (u.`UUID`=p.`biz_user`) WHERE p.`process_id`=2 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND (p.`biz_status01`>10 OR p.biz_status02>=10) AND p.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=2 AND p.biz_status01=10 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) ORDER BY p.`biz_time` DESC) a GROUP BY a.biz_user order by a.biz_time asc

SELECT MAX(sign60) sign60,MAX(time60) time60,MAX(sign70) sign70,MAX(time70) time70,MAX(sign80) sign80,MAX(time80) time80 FROM ( SELECT u.`user_sign` sign60,s.`biz_time` time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,null sign80,null time80 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_apply a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=2 AND s.`biz_status01`=40 AND s.`biz_sign`='APPLY_CHANGE_STATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=2 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#)
UNION ALL SELECT NULL sign60,NULL time60,u.`user_sign` sign70,s.`biz_time` time70,null sign80,null time80 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_apply a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=2 AND s.`biz_status01`=50 AND s.`biz_sign`='APPLY_CHANGE_STATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=2 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#)
union all
SELECT NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,u.`user_sign` sign80,s.`biz_time` time80 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_apply a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=2 AND s.`biz_status01`=60 AND s.`biz_sign`='APPLY_CHANGE_STATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=2 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#)
)a
